title: Pressure Grows for West to Give Ukraine Air-Defense Systems
description: After Russia bombarded civilian targets, G7 leaders pledged “undeterred and steadfast” financial and military support for Kyiv.

title: Biden Administration Considers Humanitarian Parole Program for Venezuelans
description: The U.S. hopes such a program will discourage more Venezuelans from crossing the border illegally.

title: Biden: Putin ‘Totally Miscalculated’ on Reaction to Ukraine Invasion
description: The Russian leader “thought he was going to be welcomed with open arms,” Mr. Biden told CNN in an interview.

title: Your Wednesday Briefing: Ukraine Seeks an ‘Air Shield’
description: Plus Xi Jinping’s push for an indivisible Chinese identity and a warning for the global economy.

title: Biden Administration Considering Humanitarian Parole Program for Venezuelans
description: The U.S. hopes such a program will discourage more Venezuelans from crossing the border illegally.

title: The Hunt to Arm Ukraine Leads to Difficult Choices for Some Nations
description: The U.S. and NATO are scouring the world for new sources of old weapons to send to Ukraine. But it risks as much peril for some nations as it does promise for Kyiv.

title: For Venezuelan Migrants in South Florida, ‘Vision of a Certain Life’ Meets Reality
description: Doral, Fla., nicknamed “Doralzuela,” has become a destination for the many people fleeing a troubled country. There, they find support, and, ideally, a new home.

title: Lufthansa Says Passengers Can’t Use Apple AirTags to Track Checked Bags
description: It appears to be the sole airline saying that international standards don’t allow passengers to use the Bluetooth devices in the cargo hold. Apple said that regulators allow their use for all baggage.

title: Ukraine Under Attack: Documenting the Russian Invasion
description: Photographers in and around Ukraine have captured the horrors of war.

title: Coronation of King Charles III Is Set for May 6
description: The king’s ceremony at Westminster Abbey, the first of its kind in seven decades, is expected to be considerably pared down from that of his mother.

title: NATO’s leader says Putin ‘is failing’ in the war and urges more weapons for Ukraine.
Bombing Kyiv Into Submission? History Says It Won’t Work.
description: Even though it creates misery and loss, the methodical bombing of civilian centers has more often been shown to rally support for resistance.

title: Biden to ‘Re-Evaluate’ Relationship With Saudi Arabia After Oil Production Cut
description: Angered by the kingdom’s decision to team up with Russia to slash petroleum output, the president signaled openness to retaliatory measures proposed in Congress, including a halt to arms sales and a new antitrust measure.

title: Hong Kong Declines to Seize Superyacht Linked to Russian Oligarch
description: The yacht, named Nord, is believed to belong to Alexei Mordashov, an ally of President Vladimir V. Putin.

title: What Russia’s Missile Strikes May Indicate About Its Weapons Stockpile
description: Russia’s assault on Ukraine on Monday raised questions about the capacity of Moscow’s forces to carry out President Vladimir V. Putin’s military calculations.

title: Ukrainian Miners Rescued After Being Trapped by Russian Airstrikes
description: Dozens of miners in Kryvyi Rih spent hours trapped underground after strikes that left many areas without power, a local official said.

title: Russia’s Revenge
description: After weeks of setbacks on the battlefield, Russia struck civilian targets in Ukraine. But Vladimir Putin’s missiles may not accomplish much.

title: Live Updates: Ukrainians Head Underground as Air Raid Sirens Blare Nationwide
description: President Volodymyr Zelensky said he would ask the leaders of the Group of 7 nations for more weapons on Tuesday after Russia’s widespread and indiscriminate attacks on civilians.

title: Israel and Lebanon Reach Landmark Maritime Deal
description: If ratified by both governments, the agreement is expected to avert the immediate threat of conflict between Israel and Hezbollah, and could eventually help salve energy shortages.

title: One Nation Under Xi: How China’s Leader Is Remaking Its Identity
description: The leader’s nationalist effort to meld ethnic groups, an agenda increasingly central to his rule, is seen as a bulwark against internal divisions and threats from the West.

title: It’s Never Too Late to Pivot From N.F.L. Linebacker to Neurosurgeon
description: When Myron Rolle was cut from the Pittsburgh Steelers, he fell into a funk until his mother reminded him of his two childhood dreams: Play football, then become a neurosurgeon. It was time for Plan B.

title: Russian forces targeted civilians in previous conflicts.
description: Russia’s attacks in Ukraine this week echo those of Moscow’s earlier military campaigns.

title: Your Tuesday Briefing
description: Russia unleashes mass strikes on Ukrainian civilians.

title: 简报：英国情报官员警告中国威胁；俄罗斯对乌克兰平民发动大规模袭击
description: 拜登谴责俄罗斯袭击，中印呼吁立即缓和局势；朝鲜称正建造水下核武器发射井；美联储前主席伯南克等三名经济学家获诺贝尔经济学奖……这里是今日要闻。
